text: Octobre 7th presidential elections is defenitely a historic moment
Together, a new Cameroon, fair and radiant is possible
Stand-up proud people, all power is yours, let's make it happen
Go, Vote, Secure and defend your Vote, only then will change happen
With your support, I will score this penalty, my foot will not shake
As 3rd President, I'll be devoted to the task and will never betray your trust
